author: M T
Shiva Kumar
text:
Eight months after using the agrarian crisis to promote his film Rocket, Kannada actor-director Satish of Lucia fame has, finally, decided to keep his promise of helping the families of farmers who committed suicide owing to financial constraints.

Mr. Satish, popularly known as ‘Ninasam Satish, had produced Rocket under his own production banner, Satish Picture House. The film hit the screens in September last year when the agrarian crisis was at its peak.

He had addressed presspersons at Mandya, Ballari, Vijayapura and other places, to announce financial assistance to the families of farmers who had ended their lives as a result of crop loss.
title: Finally, Kannada actor decides to help farmers
